result.name: customer-relationship-management-system
result.notes: Customer Relationship Management System contains details of individuals and organisations that have made contact with the regulator since 2006. This will include personal details and will include details of individuals overseas although this will be a very small minority of individuals.  The information enables the regulator to keep records of its customers and also the ability to link contact information to identify emerging risks.  Contains personal data:- Name, contact details, employer, role, complaints, whistleblowing, enquiry. Links to document management system.

organization.name: the-pensions-regulator
organization.title: The Pensions Regulator
organization.description:
The Pensions Regulator (TPR) is the UK regulator of work-based pension schemes. It works with trustees, employers, pension specialists and business advisers, giving guidance on what is expected of them.

TPR is an executive non-departmental public body of the Department for Work & Pensions

http://www.thepensionsregulator.gov.uk/

result.title: Customer Relationship Management System

extras.value: Not due to be released. Contains personal data. Will be reviewed in the light of demand and prioritisation.
